name: Gunman Clive 2
overview: After successfully rescuing Mayor Johnsons daughter, Gunman Clive returns to again find his home town under attack by bandits. To stop them once and for all he must chase after their leader; an adventure that takes him all the way around the world.This follow up to the 2012 indie hit retains the same classic gameplay formula, but dials the action up a notch further and adds many new features and improvements.
